data.question: What is the chemical formula of UWCM-1?
At what temperature was the spectrum for UWDM-1(22) acquired at 192 K simulated?
data.answer: The spectrum was simulated with rates within the slow motion limit (SML), indicating that motions are occurring too slowly to influence the appearance of the Pake doublet.

data.question: Is full rotation of the macrocycle observed in UWDM-1(B24)?
What is the space group of UWCM-1?
What method was used to study the dynamics of the UWDM-1 series?
data.answer: Deuterium solid-state NMR (2H SSNMR) was used to study the dynamics of the UWDM-1 series.

data.question: What is the formula weight of compound 6-22?
What does the presence of a single set of quadrupolar parameters in the 2H SSNMR spectrum of UWDM-1(24) at 160 K indicate?
data.answer: It indicates that all deuterium environments are equivalent, suggesting no motion or motion too slow to affect the appearance of the Pake doublet.

data.question: Is the macrocycle in UWDM-1(22) more mobile than in UWDM-1(24)?
What crystal system does UWCM-1 belong to?
What motional model was used to simulate the high-temperature spectrum of UWDM-1(24) at 480 K?
data.answer: The full rotation model combined with two-site jumps was used to simulate the high-temperature spectrum of UWDM-1(24) at 480 K.
